calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Commissioning
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Chris Ham, Professor of Health Policy and Management, University of Birmingham, and Dr Jennifer Dixon, Director, The Nuffield Trust; Rt Hon Mike O’Brien QC MP, Minister of State, Gary Belfield, Director General Commissioning and System Management, and Dr David Colin-Thomé, National Clinical Director for Primary Care, Department of Health (at 11.00am)

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Committee on Standards in Public Life
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Sir Christopher Kelly KCB, Chair, Committee on Standards in Public Life

calendar-event-select-committee.subject: Wales and Whitehall
calendar-event-select-committee.witness: Carwyn Jones AM, First Minister for Wales, and Dame Gillian Morgan DBE, Permanent Secretary, Welsh Assembly Government
